extension.description: app launcher showing app structure provided by the OS. Meaning Startmenu in Windows or .desktop files in linux

extension.summary: This module intends to provide an implementation of Extended Window Manager Hints, based on the Xlib modules for python.
extension.description: See the freedesktop.org `specification http://standards.freedesktop.org/wm-spec/wm-spec-latest.html for more information.
extension.license: GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE v. 3

extension.summary: The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client library for Python programs.
extension.description: The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client library for Python programs. It is written entirely in Python, in contrast to earlier X libraries for Python (the ancient X extension and the newer plxlib) which were interfaces to the C Xlib.
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from https://github.com/python-xlib/python-xlib Copyright (C) 2000-2002 Peter Liljenberg
extension.license: GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE v. 2.1

extension.description: Download and install add-ons from the Takezo36 Add-ons repository.
